channel.title: Voidlinux on ArchieNote

item.title: Void Linux
item.description: Introduction to Void Linux Void Linux is a lightweight, independent, rolling release operating system that is known for its simplicity and speed. It is a distribution that is built from scratch, without using any pre-existing codebase, which makes it unique in the world of Linux distributions. What sets Void Linux apart from other distributions? One of the main differences between Void Linux and other Linux distributions is its package management system.
